text: Andrés Blanco is an activist in the Socialist Workers' Party (Argentina). He was elected as a provincial deputy in Neuquén Province in 2019. He has been involved in the FaSinPat factory occupation, and is assistant secretary of the ceramics workers' union in Neuquén. ==Sources== *article Category:Living people Category:Socialist Workers' Party (Argentina) politicians Category:People from Neuquén Province Category:Argentine trade unionists Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Andrés Blanco (Argentina)
